snippet.title: "Hatsune Miku - The Planet Of Wonder And Fragments Of Wishes" Introduction
snippet.description:
Explore a planet full of wonders with Miku and friends! 

Miku and friends crash land on a mysterious planet during their space journey... 
There they meet many unique characters! 
Play all kinds of games to grant everybody's wishes! 

- About Minigames 
A total of 9 minigames including "Button Mashing" and "Slide Puzzles!" 
Collect "coins" and aim for a high score! 

Smartphone games "Hatsune Miku Amiguru Jump" and "Hatsune Miku Amiguru Train" also included! Play them on the Nintendo Switch! 

- Piapro Collaboration Songs Included 
17 songs written specifically for "Hatsune Miku - The Planet Of Wonder And Fragments Of Wishes" included! 


■Title: Hatsune Miku - The Planet Of Wonder And Fragments Of Wishes
■Release date: June 8th, 2023 (Thursday)
■Genre: Puzzle,Action
■Supported hardware: Nintendo Switch
■Number of players: 1
■Suggested retail price: 3,500 yen
■Purchasing method: Nintendo eShop (download-only software)
■Twitter: https://twitter.com/cfm_mobile

#hatsunemiku #初音ミク
